description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nAdmire the Gods:
When this creature takes damage, and the damage exceeds 25% of its Maximum {STAT_health}, reduce the damage to 25% of its Maximum {STAT_health}. The amount of damage prevented cannot exceed 200% of this creature's Maximum {STAT_health}.
name: Cosmic Boulder
